name: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the onions and garlic and cook until softened.
Add the carrots and peas and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add the cooked rice, soy sauce and green onions to the skillet.
Toss the rice and vegetables until everything is well combined.
